remarks: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit class substitution. (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
statement:
sbciegf.1 $e |- F/ x ps $.
sbciegf.2 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
sbciegf $p |- ( A e. V -> ( [. A / x ]. ph <-> ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
